post.text: Hillary Clinton is under FBI investigation AGAIN. She exposed America's most sensitive secrets, putting our national security at risk. Crooked is UNFIT to serve as our president. When I'm elected, I will PROTECT our people and our country! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Tyson
comment.text: I'm sorry to say that democrats will vote for her reguardless what the facts say.. it just doesn't matter to them that she is under FBI investigation . They will vote democrat, period,, so republicans really need to stand up for change and out vote these people.
